name: MIDI Files
description: MIDI Files can be thought of as a kind of digital sheet music that contains notes for up to 16 channels (instruments).$(br2)MIDI files have historically been used in many ways ranging from songs built-into digital pianos to video game music in older games like $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJ0Ob4PlCDU)Doom$(), $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60d4uGPNblo)Sonic$(), and $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QO6CMRg93dk)Warcraft$().
